definitions.definition: A town and community with a town council in Bridgend borough county borough, Wales ( OS grid ref SS9080 ) .
A county borough in Wales which includes the town.
A suburb of Cardigan , Ceredigion , Wales , south of the River Teifi ( OS grid ref SN1745 ) .
A small village on Loch Indaal , Islay , Argyll and Bute council area, Scotland ( OS grid ref NR3362 ) .
A small settlement near Carradale , Kintyre , Argyll and Bute council area ( OS grid ref NR7937 ) .
A village in County Donegal , Ireland , across the border from Derry , Co. Londonderry .
